name: FlexBot
description: FlexBot is a trading bot particularly for newcomers and experienced traders alike. FlexBot aims to bridge the gap between complex market dynamics and user-friendly solutions. We envision a future where anyone, regardless of their trading experience, can navigate the crypto market with confidence and ease. FlexBot empowers individuals to take control of their trading journey by offering a combination of powerful tools, intuitive functionalities, and a supportive community. Core Functionality: Telegram-based Trading Terminal: Trade directly within the familiar Telegram app, eliminating the need for complex software or exchanges. Perpetual Trading with dYdX and GMX: Gain exposure to market movements through perpetual contracts Token Sniping AI-Powered Copy Trading: Secured Wallets with 1Inch Route Keys so that assets are protected with industry-standard security measures. Revenue Sharing with Our Community. A portion of generated revenue is distributed back to the community Cross-Chain Web Terminal (Coming Soon): a versatile web terminal, enabling access to various blockchain networks and advanced functionalities. Looking Ahead: Our dedicated team is constantly innovating and expanding the FlexBot ecosystem. We are committed to delivering a continuously evolving platform that meets the evolving needs of our users. With the upcoming launch of our advanced web terminal, you can expect even more features and functionalities, including: Wallet Management: Token Swapping: Liquidity Provision Yield Farming: IDO Participation: we have an actiuve communiuty of 3,000+ users
